item.title: EBAY
item.description: score:135 Chances: eBay’s suite of mobile apps and global reach provide a significant opportunity for continued growth and expansion in the e-commerce market. The company’s agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) to resolve the inquiry regarding the sale of certain products demonstrates a commitment to addressing compliance issues and enhancing processes.
